PolicySet.Description:
PolicySet for Conformance Test IIE001.
Test IIE001 requires the PDP to be able to obtain a Policy with PolicyId="urn:oasis:names:tc:xacml:2.0:conformance-test:IIE001:policy1" and a PolicySet with PolicySetId="conformance-test:IIE001:policyset1" from its policy repository. These policies are provided in files IIE001PolicyId1.xml and IIE001PolicySetId1.xml, respectively.
In order to execute this test, the policy in file IIE001PolicyId1.xml and the policy set in file IIE001PolicySetId1.xml must be stored in a repository such that the PDP (or its Policy Retrieval Point) is able to fetch the respective policies when they are referenced by id by IIE001Policy.xml.
